snippet: Thousands of African migrants protested in Tel Aviv against a new open-ended detention law that allows migrants to be sent to a desert prison.
abstract: Thousands of African migrants, many holding banners demanding freedom for fellow migrants jailed by Israel, protest in Tel Aviv against open-ended detention law allowing migrants to be sent to prison; protests prompt United Nations statement chastising Israel for incarcerations.
lead_paragraph: Thousands of African migrants protested in Tel Aviv against a new open-ended detention law that allows migrants to be sent to a desert prison.

headline.main: Migrants in Israel Protest Law for Detention
headline.print_headline: Migrants in Israel Protest Law for Detention

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
